00034 using namespace Hypertable;
00035 namespace Logging = log4cpp;

00042   class  NoTimeLayout : public Logging::Layout {
00043   public:
00044     NoTimeLayout() { }
00045     virtual ~NoTimeLayout() { }
00046     virtual String format(const Logging::LoggingEvent& event) {
00047       return Hypertable::format("%s %s %s: %s\n",
00048           Logging::Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority).c_str(),
00049           event.categoryName.c_str(), event.ndc.c_str(),
00050           event.message.c_str());
00051     }
00052   };
00053 
00057   class  MicrosecondLayout : public Logging::Layout {
00058   public:
00059     MicrosecondLayout() { }
00060     virtual ~MicrosecondLayout() { }
00061     virtual String format(const Logging::LoggingEvent& event) {
00062       return Hypertable::format("%d %d %s %s %s: %s\n",
00063           event.timeStamp.getSeconds(), event.timeStamp.getMicroSeconds(),
00064           Logging::Priority::getPriorityName(event.priority).c_str(),
00065           event.categoryName.c_str(), event.ndc.c_str(),
00066           event.message.c_str());
00067     }
00068   };
00069 
00073   class FlushableAppender : public Logging::LayoutAppender {
00074   public:
00075     FlushableAppender(const String &name) : Logging::LayoutAppender(name) {}
00076     virtual ~FlushableAppender() {}
00077     virtual void flush() = 0;
00078 
00079     bool
00080     set_flush_per_log(bool choice) {
00081       bool old = m_flush_per_log;
00082       m_flush_per_log = choice;
00083       return old;
00084     }
00085 
00086   protected:
00087     bool m_flush_per_log;
00088   };
00089 
00093   class FlushableOstreamAppender : public FlushableAppender {
00094   public:
00095     FlushableOstreamAppender(const String& name, std::ostream &stream,
00096                              bool flush_per_log) :
00097                              FlushableAppender(name), m_stream(stream) {
00098       set_flush_per_log(flush_per_log);
00099     }
00100     virtual ~FlushableOstreamAppender() { close(); }
00101 
00102     virtual bool reopen() { return true; }
00103     virtual void close() { flush(); }
00104     virtual void flush() { m_stream.flush(); }
00105 
00106   protected:
00107     virtual void
00108     _append(const Logging::LoggingEvent& event) {
00109       m_stream << _getLayout().format(event);
00110 
00111       if (m_flush_per_log)
00112         m_stream.flush();
00113     }
00114 
00115   private:
00116     std::ostream &m_stream;
00117   };
00118 
00119   FlushableAppender *appender = 0;
00120 
00121 } // local namespace
00122 
00123 Logging::Category *Logger::logger = 0;
00124 bool Logger::show_line_numbers = true;
00125 
00126 void
00127 Logger::initialize(const String &name, int priority, bool flush_per_log,
00128                    std::ostream &out) {
00129   appender = new FlushableOstreamAppender("default", out, flush_per_log);
00130   Logging::Layout* layout = new Logging::BasicLayout();
00131   //Logging::Layout* layout = new MicrosecondLayout();
00132   appender->setLayout(layout);
00133   logger = &(Logging::Category::getInstance(name));
00134   logger->addAppender(appender);
00135   logger->setAdditivity(false);
00136   logger->setPriority(priority);
00137 }
00138 
00139 void
00140 Logger::set_level(int priority) {
00141   logger->setPriority(priority);
00142 }
00143 
00144 void
00145 Logger::suppress_line_numbers() {
00146   Logger::show_line_numbers = false;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void
00150 Logger::set_test_mode(const String &name, int fd) {
00151   Logging::FileAppender *appender;
00152   Logger::show_line_numbers = false;
00153   logger->removeAllAppenders();
00154   appender = new Logging::FileAppender(name, fd);
00155   appender->setLayout(new NoTimeLayout());
00156   logger->setAppender(appender);
00157 }
00158 
00159 bool
00160 Logger::set_flush_per_log(bool choice) {
00161   return appender->set_flush_per_log(choice);
00162 }
00163 
00164 void
00165 Logger::flush() {
00166   appender->flush();
00167 }
